snippet.title: UNYIELDER - gamescom 2024 Trailer (Ver 1.5)
snippet.description:
Check out the demo for UNYIELDER at gamescom and face the ultimate hidden challenger!

#bossrush #roguelite #movementshooter 
Destroying the stereotype of single-player games! Roguelite × Boss Rush FPS.

Utilize unique weapons, diverse abilities, and quick reflexes, and revel yourself in a high-speed battle against massive bosses!

Genre: Roguelite FPS
Platforms: Steam®
Release Date: 2025

■ 'UNYIELDER' Steam® page URL
https://store.steampowered.com/app/789940/UNYIELDER/
Developer:  TrueWorld Studios

©TrueWorld Studios Pte. Ltd. / SHUEISHA, SHUEISHA GAMES
